title: Effective Communication
text: Consider the attention span of your audience and how much information they can process at once. Focusing on a single point can enhance understanding and retention.

title: Clarity and Focus
text: When presenting, it's crucial to be clear and concise. Too many concepts can overwhelm and confuse the audience. Think about how to maintain their focus.

title: Avoiding Overload
text: Slides are meant to highlight key points, not overload the audience. Minimal information per slide aids in better understanding.

title: Engagement Over Quantity
text: More ideas on a slide could lead to disengagement. Assess how to keep your audience intrigued and involved.
